blogPost.excerpt:
Conor McGregor sits down with Adam Catterall ahead of his eagerly-awaited return to the Octagon at UFC 257 vs. Dustin Poirer. Conor reflects on the past 12 months, his role supporting his community throughout the pandemic, a possible return to boxing, Khabib, the lightweight division and his prediction for his Fight Island main event.

Watch #UFC257: Poirier v McGregor on January 23rd, live on BT Sport Box Office ➡️ https://www.bt.com/sport/box-office/

Hit 'Subscribe' above to ensure you never miss a video from the BT Sport YouTube channel.

Get a BT Sport Monthly Pass now! - http://bit.ly/BTSportMonthlyPass 

Visit and subscribe to our 'BT Sport Boxing' YouTube channel ➡️ http://www.youtube.com/c/btsportboxing

Twitter: http://twitter.com/btsport
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/btsport
Instagram:http://instagram.com/btsport
Website: http://sport.bt.com
blogPost.body:
Conor McGregor sits down with Adam Catterall ahead of his eagerly-awaited return to the Octagon at UFC 257 vs. Dustin Poirer. Conor reflects on the past 12 months, his role supporting his community throughout the pandemic, a possible return to boxing, Khabib, the lightweight division and his prediction for his Fight Island main event.

blogPost.title: "Line them up! Bring it on!" Conor McGregor ready to takeover the lightweight division | UFC 257
blogPost.author: BT Sport

localize.title: "让他们排好队！来吧！" 康纳-麦格雷戈(Conor McGregor)准备接管轻量级比赛｜UFC 257
localize.description:
康纳-麦格雷戈（Conor McGregor）与亚当-卡特尔（Adam Catterall）在他期待已久的UFC 257对阵达斯汀-波勒（Dustin Poirer）的八角笼回归之前坐下来。康纳反映了过去的12个月，他在整个流行病中支持他的社区的角色，可能回归拳击，Khabib，轻量级部门和他对他的战斗岛主事件的预测。

观看#UFC257%%。Poirier v McGregor在1月23日，在BT Sport Box Office➡️ https://www.bt.com/sport/box-office/上直播。

点击上面的 "订阅"，确保您永远不会错过BT Sport YouTube频道的视频。

现在就获得BT Sport月票 - http://bit.ly/BTSportMonthlyPass 

访问并订阅我们的 "BT Sport Boxing "YouTube频道➡️ http://www.youtube.com/c/btsportboxing。

Twitter: http://twitter.com/btsport
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/btsport
Instagram:http://instagram.com/btsport
网站：http://sport.bt.com

localize.title: "讓他們排好隊！來吧！" 康納-麥格雷戈(Conor McGregor)準備接管輕量級比賽｜UFC 257
localize.description:
康納-麥格雷戈（Conor McGregor）與亞當-卡特爾（Adam Catterall）在他期待已久的UFC 257對陣達斯汀-波勒（Dustin Poirer）的八角籠迴歸之前坐下來。康納反映了過去的12個月，他在整個流行病中支持他的社區的角色，可能迴歸拳擊，Khabib，輕量級部門和他對他的戰鬥島主事件的預測。

觀看#UFC257%%。Poirier v McGregor在1月23日，在BT Sport Box Office➡️ https://www.bt.com/sport/box-office/上直播。

點擊上面的 "訂閱"，確保您永遠不會錯過BT Sport YouTube頻道的視頻。

現在就獲得BT Sport月票 - http://bit.ly/BTSportMonthlyPass 

訪問並訂閱我們的 "BT Sport Boxing "YouTube頻道➡️ http://www.youtube.com/c/btsportboxing。

Twitter: http://twitter.com/btsport
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/btsport
Instagram:http://instagram.com/btsport
網站：http://sport.bt.com
